LanguageData.RBB.BasicBridge: Must be placed on shallow water or marsh
LanguageData.RBB.DeepWaterBridge: Must be placed on deep water
LanguageData.RBB.Boardwalk: Must be placed on a tile adjacent to water
LanguageData.RBB.NoFloorOnBridge: Cannot lay flooring on top of a bridge
LanguageData.RBB.NotOnFS: Cannot be placed over a fishing spot
LanguageData.RBB.FSTooClose: Another fishing spot is too close
LanguageData.RBB.FishingSpot1: Must be placed with the fishing spot over water or marsh, not mud
LanguageData.RBB.FishingSpot2: Must be placed with the fishing spot over water and the interaction spot on a bridge or pier
LanguageData.RBB.ShellfishTrap: Must be placed on water or marsh adjacent to a bridge or boardwalk.
LanguageData.RBB.TrapTooClose: Another shellfish trap is too close.
